sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({selector:'app-about',templateUrl:'./about.component.html',styleUrls:['./about.component.css']}) export class AboutComponent {}

About Me

I'm Bazmi Uddin, a Full Stack Developer from Gwalior with over 3 years of hands-on experience in building and optimizing scalable web applications using Angular, PHP (CodeIgniter & AdonisJS), and MySQL.

Currently, I’m working at Ubitech Solutions Pvt. Ltd., where I lead a team of developers to design and implement HRMS and CRM platforms. My work focuses on automating attendance systems, dynamic leave policy management, and real-time employee engagement tools — improving system efficiency and overall user experience.

During my journey at Ubitech Solutions, I’ve learned and worked extensively on Angular, PHP (CodeIgniter), and various frameworks, gaining deep practical knowledge in full-stack development and problem-solving in live production environments.

Alongside my professional experience, I enhanced my backend knowledge by learning Node.js through online platforms and successfully earned a certificate from Simplilearn, which helped me strengthen my understanding of server-side logic and API design.

📜 Node.js Certification

Issued by Simplilearn — Completed on 24th October 2025

View Certificate

I’m deeply passionate about building user-centric, high-performance applications that balance strong technical architecture with clean, modern UI design. I take pride in writing clean, reusable code and constantly challenge myself to learn and implement new technologies.

My journey in software development began during my B.Tech in Information Technology at IPS College of Management & Technology, where I discovered my love for solving logical problems through code. Since then, I’ve dedicated myself to building meaningful digital solutions that create real impact.

Outside of work, I enjoy exploring emerging frameworks, experimenting with creative UI concepts, and sharing my knowledge with other developers to help them grow.

💡 Full Stack Web Development
⚙️ HRMS & Workflow Automation
🚀 Clean Architecture & Scalable Design
🎯 Team Leadership

🎓 Education

Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) – Information Technology

IPS College of Management & Technology, Gwalior

Graduated: 2021
  • Angular
  • TypeScript
  • JavaScript
  • PHP (CodeIgniter / AdonisJS)
  • MySQL
  • Bootstrap
  • Git
  • Node.js
  • Vercel
